subtitle: Ogow Waajibaadkaaga
understandingText: Gudbinta xogta waxay tilmaamaysaa dhaqdhaqaaqa xogta...
importanceText: Aad ayey muhiim u tahay in xogtu si ammaan ah loo gudbiyo...

importancePoints.title: Sirnimada
importancePoints.description: Xogta waa in loo oggol yahay oo kaliya dadka loo fasaxay.

importancePoints.title: Hufnaan
importancePoints.description: Xogtu waa inay ahaato mid sax ah oo aan la bedelin.

importancePoints.title: Helitaan
importancePoints.description: Xogtu waa inay u furnaato dadka xaqa u leh.

practicesTitle: Habdhaqannada Ugu Wanaagsan ee Gudbinta Xogta
practicesIntro: Si loo hubiyo ammaanka xogta, ku dhaqanka talooyinkan waa muhiim...

practices.title: Qarsoodi
practices.description: Xogta waa in la qarxiyaa inta lagu jiro gudbinta.

practices.title: Xakameynta Gelitaanka
practices.description: Gelitaanka xogta u xaddid kuwa shaqada u baahan.

practices.title: Kormeer Joogto ah
practices.description: Si joogto ah u eeg hannaanka gudbinta xogta.

practices.title: Isticmaal Kanaallo Ammaan ah
practices.description: Ku gudbi xogta HTTPS ama VPN iwm.

complianceText: Hay’adaha waa inay la jaanqaadaan Xeerka Dhowrista Xogta ee Soomaaliya...
adviceTitle: Talooyin Waxtar leh oo loo Haysto Hay’adaha
